Articles.Content:
So, this challenge is simple(kinda).You can use any mod, except hyperedit.

The challenge is to launch a satellite on an atlas v or delta iv(doesn't matter what config) into a Molynia,Polar,or sun synchronous orbit(I know it doesn't matter in ksp but it is for the sake of realisim).

Not just any satellite though, it has to have at least 2 small antennae(NOT communitron 16s) and 1 large parabolic antenna that extends on an arm.Then Once it is in orbit use some camera mod or something to take a picture and send it to me.(Also send pictures of process of launch and rocket).
